N

nio - Variable in class org.torrent.nio.TClient
Used to implement singleton pattern on NIOThread
nioKey - Variable in class org.torrent.nio.NIOThread
The HashMaps peerManagers, piecePickers and torrentsProcessing all use an Integer as a key.
nioShutdown - Variable in class org.torrent.nio.NIOThread
Variable that, when set to true, will result result in NIOThread shutting down.
nioStoresKey - Variable in class org.torrent.coredata.ChannelData
The key used to access HashMaps stored in NIOthread containing objects such as a PeerManager
nioThread - Static variable in class org.torrent.nio.NIOThread
Used to help implement a singleton pattern for NIOThread
NIOThread - Class in org.torrent.nio
This class runs as a new Thread and handles all the I/O operations as the client goes about its work.
NIOThread() - Constructor for class org.torrent.nio.NIOThread
 
numAvailablePeers() - Method in class org.torrent.coredata.PeerManager
Confirms the amount of peers that are available to try and connect to
numDownloadingConns - Variable in class org.torrent.bencoding.TorrentFile
A count of the amount of connections currently working to download data
numPiecesObtained - Variable in class org.torrent.coredata.RarestFirst
Tracks the number of pieces obtained
numRequestsReq(ByteBuffer, int) - Method in class org.torrent.coredata.ChannelData
Returns a 2D array of the number of requests needed to download a piece.
